channel.title: Help me :( ( not for hoster )
channel.description:
i need to make a site for forums,, idk how some1 will help me?? + i got a soucre,, there stay the other site,, u know how i change it to my link?
ken.

item.title: Help me :( ( not for hoster )

item.description:

kenvanbel.

open your client.java and search for the link it tells you to go to, then change that to yours
save>compile>done[/quote]
oke thx

item.title: Help me :( ( not for hoster )
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

are you telling me to make the forums or asking? if your asking the answers no because this is server help.

go to NPChandler and search for “welcome to” and change that line to whatever you want the npc to say. save, compile and restart server.

Read full topic

if you are then look in npchandler and search for .com or .co.uk[/quote]
nono, a npc say nothing
a login and there come
welcome to …
join at the forums: …
i wil have my forums at that
u will make forums for me
